title: The de' Medici kitchen: a culinary journey
brief_description: Showcases the de’ Medici estate of Coltibuorno in Italy and their various farming activities. Examines food from the region of the estate and food associated with the farm’s produce. Describes the importance of food and dining in the Italian culture. Explores the Coltibourno region and explains regional traditions.
